forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to afternoon sunshine. High 58F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 6C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 43F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 53F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 43F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. Becoming windy during the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NNW at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. Becoming windy during the afternoon. High 56F. Winds NNW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 46F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 52F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 44F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High around 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 58F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 47F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 62F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
